sub_title: Proven Compensation & Benefits Expert: Policy, Programs, Implementation, Administration, Human Resources, Pay Systems
summary:
Summary: 
I am a highly experienced compensation and benefits professional with 18+ years experience performing global compensation policy, advisory, and administration. Proven ability to lead enterprise pay system design projects for an organization with 15,000+ full-time employees who operate in 135 countries in all global regions. Expert at providing the technical leadership to design and implement complex compensation, administration and valuation models as well as an expert at managing data, information, and intelligence workflow. Known for establishing good interpersonal relationships with key stakeholders and technical solutions partners. Certified Compensation Professional (CCP) who has been entrusted with global responsibilities and commended for transforming administrative policies and systems resulting in substantial enterprise-level improvements within the human resources function.

★★★ Earned corporate award for designing and leading a first-class global compensation analysis and pay increase system which has been recognized internally and externally as a one of a kind pay administration solution resulting in saving approximately $2M per year of administrative costs. ★★★

Areas of Expertise:
✔Compensation & Benefits | Netherlands
✔Analysis | Pay Increase Systems 
✔Administration | System Design | Classification
✔Pay Administration Solutions
✔Policy Analysis | Policy Design
✔Model Development
✔Systems Data Implementation
✔Data Review & Collection | Reports 
✔Market Surveys
✔Compensation Analysis Software (CAS)
✔Major Markets | Emerging Markets
✔People Analytics | Key Talents 
✔Talent Management
✔Recruitment Retention 
✔Technical Advisement 
✔Coach & Mentor to HR Colleagues
✔Policy Advisory
✔Board | Senior Level Communications
✔Salary Scales
✔Consultative Services for Governments

projects.title: 2002 – 2006 Compensation and Benefits Analyst - Southeastern Europe
projects.description: Produced analysis, scale development, communications and analysis and developed/updated benchmark job descriptions for markets outside of headquarters. Authored the market measurement technical notes and developed and administered custom market surveys.

contributors.headline: Proven Compensation & Benefits Expert: Policy, Programs, Implementation, Administration, Human Resources, Pay Systems

projects.title: 2006 – 2009 Compensation and Benefits Analyst - United States
projects.description: Developed CAS version integrated pay increase management with HRIS as well as cutting-edge accrual benefit valuation models with documentation and enterprise salary outlier model. Conducted full recruitment and retention analysis and board reports for U.S. headquarters. Developed and conducted diversity and pay analysis and reports.

contributors.headline: Proven Compensation & Benefits Expert: Policy, Programs, Implementation, Administration, Human Resources, Pay Systems

projects.title: 2010 – 2012 Senior Compensation and Benefits Analyst - United States and Western Europe
projects.description:
Developed and implemented first U.S. pay increase strategy model for World Bank Group.
Saved 6 weeks of manual work by automating formulaic increased methodology for staff pay increases. Developed and delivered training to analysts on C&B computational methodologies.
Managed Western Europe pay scales, pay increases, and compensation program communications as well developed the compensation data aggregation model applied in the U.S.

contributors.headline: Proven Compensation & Benefits Expert: Policy, Programs, Implementation, Administration, Human Resources, Pay Systems

courses.name: Flawless Consulting for HR Professionals (Block/Designed Learning); Presenting Data and Information (Tufte); Art and Science of Strategic Communication (World Bank); Association for HR Management in International Organizations HR Specialists (AHRMIO)

profile_positions.description:
★ Charged with modernizing compensation policies including comprehensive design, implementation, and management of salary classification and compensation programs.

►High-Level Portfolio Management: Western Europe, Americas and Caribbean as well as U.S. headquarters compensation program. 
►Headed consultations with senior management team on behalf of human resources.
►Ongoing communications with the legal department, wrote new staff rules and formal procedures governing new global pay administration practices. 
►Multi-Disciplinary Team Lead: Developed new annual pay increase administration strategy and system. 
►Responsible for the development and oversight of new business design document project working in partnership with IT Peoplesoft, HR systems integration, performance management, and payroll teams. 
►Global Pay Scale Development Projects: Designed and implemented workflow, quality assurance and peer review processes. 
►Designed and managed first ever compensation survey of U.S. based public and international sector employers.
profile_positions.title: Compensation and Benefits Officer: Policy | Administration | System Design | Classification | Survey

profile_positions.description:
★ Produced technological innovations, improved productivity, and provided successful policy and price formulas. 

Market Surveys: 
►Authored job descriptions and survey that is used globally to conduct salary surveys.
►Led procurement of survey consulting services including preparation of contractor documents.
►Managed data collection projects executed by survey consultants. 
►Reviewed and validated survey results and preparation of survey reports for participants. 
►Collected and analyzed macroeconomic data from IMF, EIU, central banks etc.

Compensation Administration: 
►Acted as principal architect and designer of the global compensation analysis software (CAS). 
►Designed and executed a merit increase strategy for the D.C. location (2011). 
►Led office salary scales and compensation programs for European satellite office clients. 
►Oversaw the development of staff transfer and return policy from to Europe offices. 
►Known as the technical lead and subject matter expert on changing currencies. 

Communication: 
►Presentations: Development and delivery on compensation programs. 
►Authored the recruitment and retention section of the annual board report.
►Acted as the primary contact for the human resources service center and the information technology department.
►Developed actuarial model document for valuation of accrual benefits. 
Analytical Studies, Policy Management, Benefits Administration and Other Assignments:
►Developed and implemented an instruction manual on the CAS and delivered same training to analysts and officers. 
►Designed the analytical approach as team leader of a review of sources of recruitment (recorded and classified the pre-employment experience for 2,700 hires globally). 
►Actuarial modeling, in-house valuation models, (performed quarterly valuations, reviewed benefit experience and assumptions, and managing the transition from in-house to consultant supported modeling).
profile_positions.title: Compensation, Benefits Analyst: Design | Studies | Reporting | Technical Advisement | Increased Prod

profile_positions.description:
★ Designed an early version of the CAS system resulting in a consistent framework for analyzing market data, designing salary scales, and merit matrices. Specific detailed tasks below:

►Data review and collection, macroeconomic data analyzation, report tables preparation (recruitment/retention and analysis of medical claims).
►Developed country-wide office salary scales using CAS software for compensation officers. 
►Oversaw the management of spreadsheets in support of valuation of accrual benefits.
profile_positions.title: Junior Compensation, Benefits Analyst: CAS | Salary Scales | Data Review & Collection | Reports

profile_positions.description:
►Reports: Data review, table preparation in support of recruitment and retention analyses. 
►Worksheets: Preparation in support validation and publishing of consultant and temporary staff fee tables. 
►Additional Responsibilities: Administered the long term consultants and temporaries 401(k) program, website design, prepared spreadsheets, analyzed compliance data, manned the 401(k) hotline and service email account, and designed Lotus Script solutions.
profile_positions.title: Compensation, Benefits Assistant: 401K | Validation | Fee Tables | Tables & Reports
